CustomField.description: Measures the data quality score of a Case
CustomField.formula: IF( OR(LEN(ContactId)=0,LEN( AccountId)=0), 0,0.10) + IF( ISPICKVAL( Status ,""), 0,0.15) + IF( ISPICKVAL( Type ,""), 0,0.15) + IF( ISPICKVAL( Origin ,""), 0,0.15) + IF( ISPICKVAL( Reason ,""), 0,0.15) + IF(ISPICKVAL(Priority, ""),0,0.15) + IF(LEN( Subject )<5,0,0.15)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Measures the data quality score of a Case
CustomField.label: Data Quality Score
